page.syntax: as P = static get as toolbar(toolbar_name as C)
page.discussion: The TOOLBAR.GET() method returns a pointer to the specified Toolbar_Name. TIP : A toolbar's name can be determined by undocking the toolbar so that it is floating, and checking the title that appears in the toolbar title bar. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
